events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I would like to request a refund because the product is not what I expected.
The customer's request involves a refund for their recent purchase, meeting refund criteria.
Assigning the case to agent Sarah, who handles refund requests for this product category.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand that you would like to request a refund, and I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and a brief explanation of why you want a refund? This will help me assist you better.
My order number is 12345678. The product looks different than described and doesnâ€™t fit my needs at all.
Thank you for the details. I can initiate a full refund for your order once we receive the product back. I will send you the return instructions shortly.
Okay, that sounds good to me. Please send the return shipping label as soon as possible.
I have emailed you the prepaid return shipping label along with instructions for returning the product to complete your refund.
Just following up to check that you have shipped the product back and to see if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Your refund has been processed successfully, and we are closing this case. Please contact us if you have any more questions.
